data.author: Advitya
data.blogText:
Pandemics are large scale outbreaks of infectious disease.   
    Basically COVID-19 pandemic is defining the global health crisis of our time and the greatest challenge we have faced since World War Two As the World Health Organization has confirmed COVID-19 is an infectious disease, after sudden acute respiratory syndrome and Middle East Respiratory Syndrome, it is the third acute infectious disease caused by Coronavirus infectious disease in this century.
